data.name: Ghost Trap Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Soundtrack for GHOST TRAP

Stylistically a mix of retro video game music, and modern hip-hop & trap.

All music created by Wilhelm G Studios
data.about_the_game:
Soundtrack for GHOST TRAP

Stylistically a mix of retro video game music, and modern hip-hop & trap.

All music created by Wilhelm G Studios
data.short_description: Original soundtrack created for "Ghost Trap" by WilhelmGStudios. Download includes the MP3s & original WAV files of every track in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 37 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 406 MB available space
